title: (07400) Alcúdia - 24 Carrer de la Rectoria
description: Large parking ideal for visiting the old city. Possibility to stay at night ...

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 1 Carrer d'En Serra
description: A large public car park, which is a great starting point for sightseeing in the city. We also stayed here twice. The square is illuminated at night and you feel safe. Garbage cans right on the street.

title: (07400) Alcúdia -
description: Ideal day / night free parking to visit the city 50 meters from the center !!! from 3:00 p.m. there are still parking spaces, solid earth/gravel ground.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 65 Carrer de Pollèntia
description: Non-potable water at the Repsol gas station

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 23 Carrer Jaume II
description: Self-service launderette "Tot Clean", two washing machines (14kgand 18kg). No card payment, only cash possible (but banknotes can be exchanged for coins on site. Open 24 hours

title: (07400) Alcúdia - Carrer d'Eivissa
description: New gravel parking lot, not schematized on the satellite map, very close to the old fortified city.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 106 Carrer de Pollèntia
description: gravel place

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 21 Carrer de l'Eclipsi
description: Located on the outskirts, wonderfully quiet even on the weekend. In the city center only 10 minutes walk. Perfect for dog owners, as there are many green areas and even a 2m high fenced area at the playground. Bakery diagonally opposite, launderette 5 minutes away.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 13 Avinguda de la Platja
description: Nice quiet place to stay in the day, no problem, cafes around.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 5 Carrer de Bearn
description: Large gravel parking. Without services and close to the port and all its rest. and shops (3 min walk) After trying all the municipal ones for an hour, we found a place here, if there isn't one inside, there is a street on the right with plenty of parking as well. No problem to spend the night, quiet night, just the noise of the few cars that moved at night.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 2 Carrer de Diana
description: Grass field very close to the beach with access ramp. close to the houses but very quiet. has containers. supermarkets 2min walking.

title: (07400) Port d'Alcúdia - 1D Carrer del Bisbe Pont
title_short: (07400) Port d'Alcúdia - 1D Carrer del Bisbe Pont
description: Parking molt great amb a zone without limitation d'alçada. Come fer nit after the ferry and perfecte tot i que al matí hi ha moviment de cotxes d'hora. Ideal for spending the day in Port d'Alcudia.

title: (07400) Marina Manresa - 4 Carrer de Miramar
description: Spot by the road (not used by cars) and by the sea, great for admiring the view, but very busy with pedestrians, runners, etc. Not very confidential. You must have a toilet in your van!

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 6 Carrer de Ciutadella
description: Free public parking. There is no sign of forbidden AC or forbidden to stay overnight. We have spent the night. Very calm .

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 6 Carrer de Sant Joan
description: Quiet street, which serves as parking to access two sandy beaches, small and very beautiful.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 798 Diseminado Disseminat 6
description: It is a small dirt road with no exit, it has a little slope but acceptable, we have spent a very quiet night

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 9 Carrer de l'Espalmador
description: Nice flat parking lot. Calm. Alarm clock with roosters. 5 'walk from the port.

title: (07400) Marina Manresa - 19 Carrer de l'Arxiduc Lluís Salvador
title_short: (07400) Marina Manresa - 19 Carrer de l'Arxiduc Lluís Salvador
description: Small car park with sea view and possibility of swimming - end of December path so no passage - no convenience (no toilets, no water, no toilets) - 4 or 5 places - please pick up your waste!

title: (07400) Mal Pas-Bon Aire - 38 Camí de Manresa
title_short: (07400) Mal Pas-Bon Aire - 38 Camí de Manresa
description: Place to park several vans very quiet in low season and very nice just above the beach

title: (07400) Alcúdia - Carrer del Moll Comercial
description:
Small car park to wait for your boat for Menorca or Barcelona.
Very simple but practical.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 45 Carrer Poblat Butà
description: Parking next to Balearia. Good in case you arrive at 4 from Barcelona by boat.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 571 Diseminado Disseminat 5
description:
Parking in the middle of the pine forest, with good shade, easy access.
It is in front of a few farms with houses.
In holy week there were some mosquitoes.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 3 Carrer de la Ginesta
description: We came across this place because we walked here from another place. There is a beach bar at the end of a street called Sarita Beach. In front of it there are 5-6 parking spaces that have also been used by large campers. You stand in the shade of the pine trees and you are right on the beach. There are 3 dixi toilets and a beach bar. The beach is very clean and there are garbage cans everywhere. A dream place to go swimming during the day.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 8 Carrer de les Acàcies
description: Fantastic place next to the lake of S'Albufera, Alcudia.

title: () Port d'Alcúdia -
description:
Access longer than the previous one by forest track. The terrain is more inclined.

In return you are completely alone in the middle of the pine forest.

Park on the right side of the road, which is flatter and does not disturb the path.

There were quite a few mosquitoes during Holy Week.
In the morning people come up to see the views of the peak and go paragliding.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 5 Carrer dels Xiprers
description: Very little trafficked street to spend the night in peace. Views of the s'Albufera lake. Across the street is Playa del Muro. Bars, gas station and Eroski very close.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 8 Carrer Can Vauma
description: Narrow headland in a saltwater river. Plenty of parking space because lots of flat space and trees create privacy. Unfortunately some rubble in the surrounding bushes. A few walkers on the way in the morning.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 6 Carrer dels Àlbers
description: One night parking facing the sea to be close to the port to embark the next morning. Places available out of season.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 77 Camí d'Alcanada
description: Very quiet and with shadows, further down is the lighthouse parking lot but here it is shady with hammocks, banks

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 86A Camí Vell de la Victòria
title_short: (07400) Alcúdia - 86A Camí Vell de la Victòria
description: Small parking lot to access the beach, little crowded place. If you put the van under you can hardly be seen from the road a little incline but not too much In the morning they came from a kayak activity but very friendly and we all tried not to bother each other

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 93A Camí d'Alcanada
description: Roadside parking. Direct view of the beach / sea.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 93A Camí d'Alcanada
description: Parking on the beach, but it has sign infront: max 5m lenght and 2.1m height

title: (07458) Muro - 133 Carrer Creuer
description: Repsol with free non potable water, just ask politely.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - Unnamed Road
description: Free parking bar.beach WC.campi

title: (07400) Alcúdia - Unnamed Road
description: Location facing the sea with a beach right in front of the parking lot! Small restaurant also

title: (07400) Alcúdia - Unnamed Road
description: Open car park of a restaurant with a spectacular sight on the bay but with a big unevenness.

title: (07460) -
description: Little spot on the Ma-2220 Alcúdia and Pollença, opposite Carrer Club Sol-Puerto, behind a bus stop, right next to the sea.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - Unnamed Road
description: Mirador La Victoria, with ample parking. Road in good condition, although a little narrow and with some curves (we have passed comfortably with a profiled AC). In high season it is better to go early to find a place.

title: (07458) Illes Balears -
description: In the middle of the main street. 2 * beach line. Enough places to park. flat. surrounded by shops and bars. gratuitous. you can sleep well, despite the fact that tonight (weekend) there was traffic, movement and noise. The presence of a lot of mosquitoes is surprising. bring repellent.

title: (07400) Cielo de Bonaire - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking lot flatter than the one above. 15min from the refuge. Forbidden to camp in all the area. We are in a nasturtium motorhome 2.90m high and 5.90 long and we had no problems with the road.

title: (07470) Pollença - 195 Via Alemanya
description: Within walking distance to Port Pollensa - with dogs perfect for swimming

title: (07400) Alcúdia - Unnamed Road
description: Several gravel places, surrounded by nature. At the end of the "road" begins the trail to "Coll Baix". "Road" and parking NOT suitable for campers !!

title: (07400) Alcúdia - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet with spectacular views on the side of the road. Without services.

title: (07470) Pollença - 92 Carrer del Romaní
description: Very large parallel parking next to the main avenue next to the sea. A few meters from a dog beach and Pollença beach. Silent, level. Surrounded by a couple of houses, but also by the sea and mountains.

title: (07458) Muro -
description: Albufera car park. It is usually crowded and noisy from cars. there are trees so some sites are not suitable for tall motorhomes.

title: (07400) Cielo de Bonaire -
description: Petite aire pour stationner 2 vans avec possibilité de s’installer à quelques mettre pour manger (terrains plat). Super point de vue pour le coucher de soleil mais un peu sale à certains endroits (papier toilette, déchets …). Nous y avons passé la nuit au calme et à l’abris du vent

title: (07470) Pollença - 1 Via Alemanya
description: Parking by the sea next to a picnic area, beach (also for dogs) and playground.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - Unnamed Road
description: Small quiet location, on a quiet road, overlooking the sea, with breathtaking views. This is the end of the road before military zone. Half turn possible for small templates.

title: (07458) Muro - 763 Carrer Platja
description: A truly splendid spot by the sea! It is a small car park in a circle that can accommodate several vans / motorhomes.

title: (07458) Muro - Carrer Joglars
description: Dead end street, with picnic area, very close to the beach, on the right side of the street we park several motorhomes

title: (07470) Pollença - 2 Carrer del Corb Marí
description: Attention attention!!! A steel cable hangs quite low in the middle of the parking lot. Unfortunately we didn't see it and drove inside. Free parking in the Port of Pollença. It's very big, it fits in many cars. We had a quiet night despite there being no dumpsters or toilets.

title: (07470) Pollença - 8 Carrer de la Nansa
description: Parking next to the road under trees in a residential area. Quiet with no facilities. We parked here with a camping car.

title: (07470) Pollença - 4 Carrer Hernán Cortés
description:
Dead end street in a residential area, end of the promenade area, 1.5 km from the center and with sea views, perfect for one night.
Only for vehicles less than 5m in lenght.

title: (07470) Pollença - 133 Carrer de Joan XXIII
description: Refill water (tank water / not drinking water) at the BP petrol station.  Simple & uncomplicated!

title: (07458) Muro - Carrer Arenes
description: Parking suitable for small vans. Not suitable for AC in high season, since many cars come and it is difficult to manoeuvre. 50 meters from fantastic beach and walks.

title: (07470) Pollença - 115 Polígon Vora Mar
description: Amazing small parking with great shadow!  You can rest here with the van there is space for like one or two vans. Can stay three days and after a crazy English guy come and tell you that maximum three days, he take a picture of you and said please let me park my car because I don’t wanna walk 50 mts more!  Small beach beautiful

title: (07470) Pollença - 198 Carrer Can Singala
description: End of a street. Little traffic

title: (07470) Pollença - 77A Carrer de Formentor
description: Street with plenty of space and about 50m from the beach, if you're lucky you can get some shade from some trees. Likewise, there are no houses in front, so it is quite private for a street where you can park

title: (07470) Pollença - 34 Carrer de l'Almirall Cervera
description: It is a public car park with no restrictions on hours or use, very close to the sports pier and the area of bars and restaurants, it does not have any type of extra services. Appropriate to visit the town and short overnight stays.

title: (07470) Port de Pollença - 69 Avinguda de Bocchoris
title_short: (07470) Port de Pollença - 69 Avinguda de Bocchoris
description: Ample free parking, you can park and maneuver well, very close to the main promenade and the beach.

title: (07470) Pollença - 34B Carrer de sa Talaia
description: wide and quiet street

title: (07470) Pollença - 28A Avinguda de Bocchoris
description: Great place to stop with kids - you have a play ground next to the parking area. With Cala Boger hiking trail 5min away and right next to the main beach pathway it is perfect place to stay overnight after exploring the area.

title: (07460) - 33 Diseminado Poligono 2
description: Picnic area with table, BBQ and above all drinking water point which is rare on the island! There is also a departure point for the Puig de Santuiri. Possibility of sleeping on site even if the place does not necessarily make you dream!

title: (07460) Pollença - 3 Ma-2210
description: We went to the parking lot above but the van is unstable to sleep and going down we found this one. Good views, quiet. Next to the observation deck and the crevette climbing area

title: (07460) Pollença - 3 Ma-2210
description: A place just before climbing the observation tower. Slightly inclined position (down the mountain), nice view and calm.

title: (07460) Pollença - 35A Polígon Industrial
description: Air + water + washing + vacuum cleaner + station

title: (07460) - 206B Diseminado Poligono 9
description: Parking to go up to the tower, climb to see the sunset (tower) and we spent the night there. Views of Pollensa and Cala de Formentor. Sunrise views, cars can arrive in the morning. A very quiet place even though it was windy at night.

title: (07460) Pollença - 999 Camí del Cementeri
description: Quiet place to sleep. It is a free parking next to the soccer field. Silent all night, until 8 in the morning when the cleaning services arrived and were shouting next to the van.

title: (07460) - 206A Diseminado Poligono 9
description: At the end of a narrow and winding road, a magnificent spot to spend the night. In the morning we are facing the sunrise, accompanied by goats. Sublime view over the bay of Polença. The tower is right above us and gives us a magnificent 180 degree view of this region.

title: (07460) Pollensa - 3 Ma-2210
description: Small esplanade of land next to the viewpoint

name: Ca’n Pacienci
title: (07460) Ca’n Pacienci
description:
Information and service centre for motorhomes in Majorca

 DIRECTLY OPPOSITE LIDL POLLENCA

Ca'n Pacienci literally means "house without stress". So it is ideal to stay with your motorhome.
Our farm is beautifully located between Pollenca and Port Pollenca. Ideal to start cycling or hiking tours.
Located just a few kilometres from the beach.
Outdoor shower in the garden. (From 10 September access to bathroom with hot shower).
Electricity, toilet and washbasin.
Dishwashing area. 
Possibility of heating meals.
Possibility of using washing machine and tumble dryer.
Service centre for camper vans also available.
Water tank filling (non-potable water), grey water emptying and black water emptying.
We think ecologically: both grey water and black water are collected in a tank and then collected by a specialised treatment company. 
( unique in Mallorca )
Limited number of spaces, so reservation for a motorhome parking space is recommended by phone ( can also be done via whatsapp )
Cost per night: €20 per parking space & 2 people. €5 per person extra.
Beautiful sunset in our garden. 
Delicious Illy coffee available
20 kinds of Belgian beers
Local wines
On reservation we serve breakfast and a dish of the day in the evening at very democratic prices.

Note: It is not allowed in Mallorca to put out awnings or terraces.
You can always use the terrace, the garden or our indoor area free of charge.
We look forward to your visit !

address.street: Crta MA 2200 Puerto Pollença a Pollença km 54,2 OPPOSITE LIDL POLLENCA

description: Large free parking. Quiet and conveniently located at night to visit the city. No installations.

title: (07460) Pollença - 66 Carrer Zona Formentor

On the beach there are toilets.

Large municipal library parking lot.
 There is also ample parking for large motorhomes.

title_short: (07469) Cala Sant Vicenç - 94 Carrer Torrent de Can Botana

title: (07460) Pollensa - 104 Carrer de Cecili Metel
description: Self-service laundry. It has two 14kg washing machines and one 18kg washing machine.  There are two dryers. It's great and it's pretty fast. The hours are from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.

title: (07469) Cala Sant Vicenç - 7A Plaça Cala Molins
title_short: (07469) Cala Sant Vicenç - 7A Plaça Cala Molins

title: (07469) Cala Sant Vicenç - 5 Plaça Sant Vicenç
title_short: (07469) Cala Sant Vicenç - 5 Plaça Sant Vicenç
description: Free parking spaces next to the information and tourism office. There is a large park with tables and plenty of shade. Open public services. Next to the beach.

title: (07460) Pollença - 11 Carrer Sense Nom
description: Small dirt parking lot, with a few trees for shade. Small bridge that joins the village, 10 min walk from the city center (restaurants, bars, walks, shops...). Small flat, we are next to a road, quite quiet but a few cars pass from time to time.

title: (07458) Can Picafort - 92 Carretera Artà-Alcúdia
description: In contrast to the vast majority of Repsol gas stations on the island, there are not only butane gas bottles here, but also propane gas bottles (as of 11/22).

title: (07460) Pollença - 129 Cami de la Font

title: (07460) Pollença - 233 Diseminado Poligono 9

Beautiful area surrounded by nature and close to the sea. Unfortunately it takes little internet, but in reality all over that area

description: Carla self-service laundry

Very central to make purchases in all supermarkets Eroski, Mercadona, lidl, hyper center. Self-service laundry in Calle Gran, 67. In the town square there are many restaurants with good atmosphere and good prices. Sundays market in the town square.

title: (07420) Sa Pobla - 37 PM-343
description: Ample parking in the station perfect for fairs very quiet atlado gas station see you martifurgo road

title: (07460) Port de Pollença -

title: (07460) Pollença -

title: (07459) Santa Margalida - 158 Diseminado Son Real

title: (07460) Pollença - Unnamed Road
description: Parking with incredible views. It corresponds to a motorhome or two vans. Spectacular views of the sunset.

title: (07310) Campanet - 135 Diseminado Poligon 1

title: (07460) - 231 Diseminado Poligono 9

title: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 2 Carrer Roselles
title_short: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 2 Carrer Roselles
description: Es gibt viele kleine Straßen direkt in Strandnähe, auf denen man kostenfrei parken kann. Wir haben hier eine Nacht direkt am Strand verbracht und sind morgens mit Meerblick aufgewacht. Direkt nebenan gibt es eine Beachbar und ein Café mit kleinen Supermarkt.

title: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 2 Carrer de l'Ancora
title_short: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 2 Carrer de l'Ancora

title: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 1A Calle Llarg
title_short: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 1A Calle Llarg
description: Space enabled by the town hall. Without emptying or filling services. It is a little inclined. Behind is a pine forest and the beach is at the end, down the street.

title: (07310) Campanet - 70 Carreró d'En Curt
description: A small car park 5 minutes from the center of Campanet. Only suitable for small vans. Parking is slightly sloping.

title: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 1 Carrer Sant Lluís
title_short: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 1 Carrer Sant Lluís

title_short: (07579) Urbanització s'Estanyol - 53 Carrer des Pla de Mar

title: (07579) Urbanització s'Estanyol -

title: (07300) Inca - Unnamed Road
description: Stop area, not for very long stays, for a car to see nature in its purest state.

title: (07579) Colonia de Sant Pere - 65 Polígon de la Mar
title_short: (07579) Colonia de Sant Pere - 65 Polígon de la Mar
description: Parking next to the port with sea views, the places are not very large. Very quiet at the time we have been, we have slept very well although there are bars around and it may not be recommended in high season.

title: (07316) Selva - 1 Calle Zona Deportiva
description: Quiet car park. At the cost of a children's park and soccer field. We were in January and the toilets were closed. Drinking water to the park. Cap sign prohibiting overnight stays. Super quiet. Walking 2 minutes there is bakery, supermarket, restaurant, bathroom.

title: (07579) Colonia de Sant Pere - 4 Carrer Ca'n Metxo
title_short: (07579) Colonia de Sant Pere - 4 Carrer Ca'n Metxo
description: Very quiet urban parking next to a pharmacy. I doubt that with here you can enter since the entrance is a bit narrow. With a gv I entered without problems. place to sleep very very quiet (better than the other 2 car parks).

title: (07570) Artà - Ma-12
description: Gas station with free air and water, you can refill the tanks without problem

title: (07579) Artà - 3 Diseminado Camping Club
description: In front of a former campsite, you stand quietly on a very little-used road; only now and then people who walk their dog or go for a walk.

title: (07300) Inca - 106 Diseminado Poligono 6
description: Below the Ermita there is a large gravel / meadow area that is designated as a parking lot. There is a small playground at the Ermita and you have a beautiful view of Llubí. The environment is calm and we stood here all alone in December.

title: (07315) Escorca - 19 Ma-10
description: Nice picnic area. Parking place for around twenty cars, tables and benches, children playground, toilets, barbecue spots, open hut.

title: (07579) Artà - Unnamed Road
description: Dead end road. Possibility to park but as often to stay the night it is not explicit. Impressive calm in high season. Fabulous panorama. In a Van and for one night, it's perfect

name: Pixarells camping area
title: (07315) Pixarells camping area
description: It is a camping area managed by the municipality. You have to go to the Lluc campsite next to the monastery to report and pay for your night. 5 euros per person, free under 14 years. At the site, take the small path that goes down after the fountain. WC on the ground floor, tables. Be careful not to have mosquitoes ... passing the guards in the morning to verify the payment.

title: (07300) Inca - Carretera de Santa Magdelena
description: Just beautiful

title: (07300) Inca -
description: Picnic area about 1 km before sleeping. Fits a van. Several places available almost flat. Protected by trees.

title: (07315) Escorca - 38 Diseminado Son Amer
description: Parking very quiet in the countryside, flat.

title: (07579) Betlem - 134 Avinguda Llorer
description: We slept here after the police invited us to go to the park4nights near the sea. It is a fairly large field, next to a road that leads to an urbanization, quiet at night. From here, a path goes up to the Betlem viewpoint (50 ') with beautiful views (one of the photos is from the viewpoint).

title: (07579) Betlem - 72 Polígon Artà
description: Parking at the end of a dead-end street. We spent one night here after checking that it was not possible to park in the rest of 4nights in front of the sea. Quiet and flat place, without services.

title: (07315) Escorca - 42 Baixada Urbanización es Guix
description: Asphalt parking in battery and in line surrounded by trees and parallel to a sidewalk with mountain views, to the left of the Son Amer refuge. The road ends in a cul-de-sac where there is a waste collection point. We have slept in a van without problem. There are no services of any kind, but there is a gas station 5 minutes away by car.

title: (07315) Escorca - 33 Baixada Urbanización es Guix
description: Large parking in dead end, quiet, flat and shaded.

title: (07300) Inca - 1 Diseminado Poligono 8
description: Butane and propane cylinders available

title: (07579) Betlem - 10T Polígon Ferrutx
description: After a climb of about a hundred meters on a sloping track, a nice flat place with a magnificent view.

title: (07315) Lluc - 8 Calle Peregrino
description: Lluc Monastery. Large car park, not specific to motorhomes, although you can park easily and stay overnight. Open 24h. Merenderos, several restaurants. Lovely setting. Hiking trails nearby. Water source.

title: (07315) Escorca - Ma-10
description: Small parking on the road, with a nice picnic area.

title: (07314) Caimari - 1A Plaça Major
description: Quite place

title: (07314) Selva - 30 Diseminado Poligono 13
description: Ample and paved parking next to the ethnological park. Very quiet and 300 meters from the urban center.

title: (07313) Escorca - 47 Ma-2130
description: Sa coveta negra recreational area, quiet place under the pines. Very good for an overnight stay

title: (07313) Escorca - 47 Ma-2130
description: Parking almost flat in a hairpin of the road. We had a comfortable night there. Frequent passages of passenger vehicles during the day, in the evening it becomes much quieter. Place for 3 vans maximu, difficult to access with a motorhome. Right next to the beautiful climbing gardens of Caimari.

title: (07579) Artà - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place and separated from civilization. The road is very narrow. With a motorhome, it would not go up, but for vans, it's perfect. Without service

title: (07300) Inca - 57 Carrer Maó
description: Parking on the road. Very quiet area with 2 places. In front of a Children's Park and athletics track also with views of the Serra de Tramumtana 10 minutes from Inca on foot

title: (07300) Inca - 4 Carrer de Joan Dauder
description: Vacant lot on the immediate edge of the city, about ten minutes walk from the center, very well placed, extremely quiet. no service, but very practical

title: (07300) Inca - 4 Carrer de Joan Dauder
description:
Laundry with 14kg and 18kg machines and 5 tumble dryers. Open 365 days, from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m.
Payable with coins, money changer available. Detergent (Ariel) is included in the price and will be added automatically - unfortunately you cannot use your own.

title: (07313) Selva - Unnamed Road
description: There is an old ruin on top of the mountain with benches, tables and a picnic area for grilling and everything. There is also enough parking space.

title: (07315) Escorca -
description: Parking at the start of the hike to the Pareis and an old restaurant. Close to the road, therefore to the passage but overall pleasant and practical.

title: (07300) Inca - 122 Carrer Joan d'Austria
description: Very good place to visit Inca, big esplanade and with trees for shade, if not busy there is a cupboard with a tap, a lot of cars and trucks etc there are room for everyone

title: (07300) Inca - 50 Carrer Joan d'Austria
description: Economic Diesel station, non-potable water?, bathrooms, and car wash.

title: (07300) Inca - 7 Carrer de Salvador Espriu
description: Parking for the municipal swimming pool, next to a large playground for children, you can buy a pass for a few hours in the pool and the possibility of showers. There is a cafeteria right next to it and a starting area for the Tramuntana. Area with life during the day and at night, very quiet with police presence.

title: (07570) Artà - Ma-3333
description: Small square between Torente and street; quiet, little traffic (also suitable for a night (max. Van < 5m).

title: (07510) Sineu - 3 Carrer Doctor Rafel Rotger i Mestre
title_short: (07510) Sineu - 3 Carrer Doctor Rafel Rotger i Mestre
description: Parking at a small park on the outskirts of the village. Perfect to spend the night before/after a tour of the village, there are great restaurants & a small brewery there. We stayed there for 2 nights and had no problems whatsoever.

address.street: 3 Carrer Doctor Rafel Rotger i Mestre

title: (07510) Sineu - 6 Carrer del Carril
description: Public parking, ideal for visiting the town of "Sineu", a few meters from the center and all its activity. The train passes right next to it, but it does not bother, We enjoyed its night market and had a great night. Lovely town. . The parking area does not have services

title: (07369) Selva - Unnamed Road
description: Public park, with about 7 tables and grills to spend the day and it is possible to stay at night, access is by a dirt road with stones, but it can be done slowly and easily. Not very suitable for large caravans. lots of tree shade and place for hammocks

title: (07520) Balearic Islands - 6013 Diseminado Sector Num 1
description: Drinking water at Repsol gas station

title: (07510) Sineu - 1241 Diseminado Diseminados Var
description: Parking lot at school

title: (07510) - 149 Diseminado Son Nadal
description: Hermitage with a place to cover you from the rain, a porch, picnic tables, closed toilets and views and tranquility, olive trees and pine trees

title: (07510) Sineu - 41A Carrer Nou
description: Parking on the outskirts

title: (07360) Lloseta - 1E Carrer Frederic García Lorca
description: Wide and quiet street in the upper part of Lloseta, right there is a small playground for children.

title: (07315) Escorca - Ma-10
description: A quiet place to stay in the middle of mountains right by the lake. The road is lightly trafficked at night.

title: (07315) Escorca - Ma-2141
description: Quiet place, without services. Some level area. beautiful afternoon views

title: (07315) Escorca - Ma-2141
description: 3/4 almost flat spot within the ring road, plus another large space beyond the road in front of the bar, which however is very sloping. No service at night but still highly recommended for climate, view (wonderful starry) and tranquility; during the day an open bar with bathrooms.

title: (07570) Artà - 205 Diseminado Poligon 24
description: Nice flat parking spot. Near by the road so its a bit noisy here. A little of space even for big vans.

title: (07570) Artà -
description: Parking in the city of Arta, at the foot of the sanctuary. Many places, we spent the night at the end of the parking with a view of the sanctuary, ready for the city tour the next day. Numerous passage of the police in the evening that we never said anything. We even unpacked table and chairs to eat at night, while storing absolutely everything for the night. We are in the middle of October, so out of season. Market in the city on Tuesday. The place is certainly not sublime, but it allows you to sleep safely to visit the city.

title: (07570) Artà - 79 Carrer de Ciutat
description: Repsol with free water to fill up the camper tank.

title: (07570) Artà - 19 Carrer dels Blanquers
description: Ample parking in town.

title: (07579) Artà - Carretera Camide Cala Mitjana
description: Parking of a viewpoint on the access road to Cala Torta and Cala Mitjana. Quiet place, and although it is next to the road, very few cars pass during night. Surrounded by pine forests and incredible views. Access suitable for large ACs too. Pretty flat.

title: (07570) Artà - 228 Carrer del Cos
description: Parking for sightseeing. Driveway up to 6m in length.

title: (07570) Artà - 16 Diseminado Can Pamboli
description: Free parking within walking distance of the pretty little town of Arta. view of the upper town. plenty of places out of season.

title: (07570) Artà - 16 Diseminado Can Pamboli
description: You can fill up with water for free. But not that fast.

title: (07360) Lloseta - 3 Carrer Sabaters
description: GALP service area with car wash, they have a hose,  and a small park for children to entertain themselves while you clean. It also has a bar to have a drink sitting at a table.

title: (07315) Escorca - Ma-10
description: Nice picnic area next to the lake.

title: (07579) Artà - Carretera Camide Cala Mitjana
description: Parking at the access roads to Cala Torta, Cala Mitjada and Cala Estrella. Is also suitable for large motorhomes that do not create the (more beautiful, directly on the sea) neighboring places. It is nice and straight at the pine forest. Was not disturbed ...

title: (07579) Cala Mesquida -
description: Nice spot, small location slightly set back from the road very little used because in poor condition. The road goes around to the beach but is impassable a few hundred meters further with a van. Nice view, only one place relatively flat, in the middle of the vegetation.

title: (07570) Artà - 25 Avinguda dels Pujols
description: Free parking left and right of the roundabout. Ideal to visit Arta. I have not stayed here. But I think it will be quiet at night. Also very suitable for larger mobile.

title: (07579) Artà - Carretera Camide Cala Mitjana
description: BEAUTIFUL CREE!!! Crystal clear waters, accessible only by 4x4, or by motorhome with a certain height and skill behind the wheel. Take care of the environment!

title: (07144) Costitx - 9 CamÍ de Son Bernat
description: Parking of the astronomical observatory. quiet despite regular flights from 5h to 23h. visit of the observatory possible Friday and Saturday evening at 20h. reservation 34649997752.

title: (07315) Escorca - Ma-2141
description: Parking for 3/4 vehicles with magnificent views of Sa Calobra with garbage. Close to the road but very quiet at night.

title: (07315) Port de Sa Calobra - 16 Carrer Port de Sa Calobra
title_short: (07315) Port de Sa Calobra - 16 Carrer Port de Sa Calobra
description: Paying public showers and toilets open from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. outside these hours direct you to the path that leads to Torrent des pareis you will find other closed showers and self-service toilets

title: (07315) Port de Sa Calobra - 23 Carrer Port de Sa Calobra
title_short: (07315) Port de Sa Calobra - 23 Carrer Port de Sa Calobra
description: Paid parking to get to Cala Torrent de Paréis through the transit cave.

title: (07315) Port de Sa Calobra - 1 Lugar Can Nyegus
title_short: (07315) Port de Sa Calobra - 1 Lugar Can Nyegus
description: Parking to enter sa calobra.  So it's just to visit

title: (07579) Cala Mesquida - Unnamed Road
description: Abandoned Bay. Near Cala Ratjada. Fantastically beautiful, you can definitely spend your night here undisturbed by the sea!

title: (07579) Artà - Carretera Camide Cala Mitjana
description: Cala Torta Parking in the pine forest before the beach. They told us in the tourist office of Arta, that the city council intended to restrict access to motorhomes from 2019. During the day, it's partytime, at night, it's is super quiet. The last section is a track.

title: (07520) Petra - Camí de Son Torrat
description: Quiet place near road (almost no cars at night), flat, with easy access. You can park your vehicle, sit on brick wall and enjoy nice view.

title: (07315) Escorca - 2 Ma-10
description:
Parking lot for about ten cars, toillete, fresh water, tables and banches.
Good starting point for hiking, sometimes loud Traffics

title: (07110) Bunyola - 3 Carrer Costa i Llobera
description: Place to rest or spend the night, without services, two or three motorhomes fit during the week, on a weekend full of cars, hiking trails and MTB, on the weekend cars and motorcycles do not stop passing the road is stuck but x the night very quiet, source of water

title: (07315) Escorca - 2 Ma-10
description: Parking overlooking lake

title: (07315) Escorca - Ma-10
description: Parking next to the road ... one flat place and two with a slight incline ... two nights of quiet and waking up with the cowbells of the animals ...

title: (07315) Escorca - 18 Diseminado Platja Tuent
description: Explanada a un lado de la carretera, nada ruidosa. Muchos curiosos que paran para hacer unas fotos a las vistas y seguir su ruta. Yo he pasado la noche aqui varias veces durante diferentes años y no he tenido ningun problema. Este establecimiento lleva cerrado años.

title: (07250) Vilafranca de Bonany - Unnamed Road
description: The Bonany Monastery car park offers a gravel parking space under trees for one to a maximum of two vans and many vacant straight asphalt parking spaces. It is very clean and there are some garbage cans. Here you are outside the monastery walls, which we much preferred to driving directly into a private area. There would also be parking spaces right next to a picnic area and the toilets. Especially since the monastery is inhabited and also offers rentals, it was not right for us to spend the night higher up directly under strange windows. The toilets are on the monastery grounds, 2-3 minutes from the lower parking lot.

title: (07500) Manacor - 65 Poligono Poligon 28
description: Area to spend the night near the road, area with trees with stone benches.

title: (07520) Petra - Unnamed Road
description: Buen sitio para aparcar y pernoctar, situado justo al lado de la ermita de Bonany. Hay mesas de picnic y un pozo de agua potable (cerrado ahora por COVID). Magníficas vistas

title: (07315) Escorca - 10 Diseminado Platja Tuent
description: Spot with superb views of the cala de Tuent. Small recess that can put a van a little away from the road, very shady. The road that leads to it is a cul de sac and not very busy. We had a long time there but not at night, but that does not matter in my opinion.

title: (07589) Cala Mesquida - 74C Via Silvana
description: Very wide quiet street with easy access into and out of Cala mezquina

title: (07589) Capdepera - 999 Calle Esperrall
description: Dead end street that widens at the end to allow turning. We spent the night when the tourist season was over and super quiet. Views of the entire beach of Cala Mesquida. Possibly in summer there is noise and you can not park. Out of season I recommend it. Nearby there are garbage and services.

title: (07589) Cala Mesquida - 2 Calle A-c C Mesquida
title_short: (07589) Cala Mesquida - 2 Calle A-c C Mesquida
description: Perfect place to visit the Mesquida cove, plenty of shade during the day and afternoon, outings on trails for excursions.

title: (07589) Cala Mesquida - 57 Avenida Marian-c.msq
description: Parking open 24 hours, in summer it is quite full, but we went in November and there was no one, summer tourist area. Departure from point of excursions and to walk, very quiet place both day and night.

title: (07589) Cala Mesquida - 1 Carrer des Rap
description: Quiet place sheltered from the excitement of the city under the trees. It is far from being an idyllic place but very practical to spend a night! In addition, you will be 5 minutes walk from the beach which is just splendid!

title: (07315) Escorca - 31 Urbanizacion Cala Tuent Polig 2 C Tuen
title_short: (07315) Escorca - 31 Urbanizacion Cala Tuent Polig 2 C Tuen
description: Small recess in the ground which can accommodate 2/3 vans with a nice view of the Puig Major. On the side of the road, in a bend but with very little traffic at night! Place that helps out for one night being very close to the creek.

address.street: 31 Urbanizacion Cala Tuent Polig 2 C Tuen

title: (07315) Cala Tuent - 1B Diseminado Platja Tuent
description: Nice spot along a very quiet little road. Several flat pitches away from the crowds. Beach at 10min max on foot. Ideal out of season to not be bothered. Sunset at Cala Tuent not to be missed.

title: (07518) Lloret de Vistalegre - p343 Camí des Cementírí
title_short: (07518) Lloret de Vistalegre - p343 Camí des Cementírí
description: Municipal sports center parking area with services, old camping area (Covid eye) possibility of excursions in the communal municipality forest (on foot, or by bike)

title: (07140) Sencelles - 19 Carrer de l'Església
description: Sencelles public parking. always empty

title: (07350) Binissalem - 60 Diseminado Poligono 15
description: Esplanade in the upper area of the town, field area with soccer field and basketball. In the area above there is a park and drinking water and going up the hill are the municipal facilities with a swimming pool, bar and showers. In summer you can shower and swim by paying a small amount. Starting point for excursions in the mountains.

title: (07350) Binissalem - 40 Carrer de Gaspar Vallès
description: Only short vehicles. It is the parking lot of the train station. unpaved but flat

title: (07315) Escorca - 4 Diseminado Platja Tuent
description: A row of some parking slots. Good view, not many people, quiet.

title: (07350) Binissalem - 26H Carrer de sa Mostra
description: Parking.
